section.title: Acknowledgements
section.para: Many thanks to the following Red Hat Engineering Content Services contributors for adding valuable content to this reference.
Darrin Mison contributed the base technical information for , and .
Sean Rogers contributed heavily to with reworked and detailed XML element guidelines from the ECS wiki. These guidelines were originally written by David O'Brien.
Many thanks to Ruediger Landmann and the Publican Team for allowing us to directly include , , and from the Publican User Guide.
